user_review: This place opened during this COVID difficult times. I would round it up to 4 stars for their courage and suffering. This place offers a authentic north west Chinese cuisines. Cold liangpi salad (凉皮) and braised pork burger (肉夹馍）are their specialty. It should be tried by a pair otherwise it isn't enough for a meal. Considering two items to be full, someone may think it costs more than other place but I don't think so. The price is fair. The lamb soup with pita pieces soaked is another must try. I like the salad and burger set very much and I came here several times. One time the quality dropped a bit I guess due to the low traffic. One thing to complain may be the service. They are inexperienced,waiting time so long or gave me wrong change. Sometimes they were friendly.
kind of pricy for the portion and it dosent even taste good. huge disappointment.
